name: XWUI List Component
description: List component for displaying a collection of items. Supports bordered and hoverable styles, checkable items with select all, icons, avatars, and actions. Uses XWUIItemGroup internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

bordered.description: Whether to show borders around list items

hoverable.description: Whether list items should have hover effects

checkable.description: Whether list items can be checked/selected

showSelectAll.description: Whether to show select all checkbox (when checkable is true)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the list

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of list items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the list item

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the item

avatar.description: Avatar image URL for the item

action.description: Action element to display on the right

checked.description: Whether the item is checked (when checkable is true)
